name: Iris Magician
desc:
Pendulum Effect
Once per turn: You can target 1 DARK Spellcaster-Type monster you control; if that monster is still face-up on the field, for an attack involving it and an opponent's monster, any battle damage it inflicts to your opponent is doubled. This effect lasts until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field). Then, destroy this card.

Monster Effect
(This card is always treated as a "Pendulum Dragon" card.)
If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Pendulumgraph" card from your Deck to your hand.
